Public MustInherit Class DocumentViewerBase Inherits Control Implements IAddChild, IServiceProvider
public ref class DocumentViewerBase abstract : System::Windows::Controls::Control, IServiceProvider, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild

summary.span: 提供用于显示固定内容或流动内容（分别由 或 表示）的查看器的基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for viewers that are intended to display fixed or flow content (represented by a or , respectively).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个最小的基本类，用于提供能够在文档查看方案之间通用的唯一基本功能。 is a minimal base class, intended to provide only basic functionality that is common across document viewing scenarios. 此基类提供了没有用户界面。This base class provides no user interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 路由的命令会导致在查看器中跳转到在当前的指示的页码。The routed command cause the viewer to jump to an indicated page number in the current . 方法指示指定的页号是否是有效的页面跳转到当前文档中。The method indicates whether or not a specified page number is a valid page to jump to in the current document. 如果*pageNumber*指定无效的页将转到 (由方法)，此方法不执行任何操作。If *pageNumber* specifies an invalid page to go to (as indicated by the method), this method does nothing.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageCount As Integer
public: property int PageCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前 的总页数。

span.span: Gets the total number of pages in the current .

value.span: 在当前文档中，页面数或**0**如果当前未不加载任何文档。

span.span: The number of pages in the current document, or **0** if no document is currently loaded.
This property has no default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分页内容时将更新此值。This value is updated as content is paginated. 由于流内容具有固定的页没有概念，如果查看器的大小调整，或修改正在显示的内容可能更改此属性的值。Because flow content has no notion of fixed pages, the value of this property may change if the viewer is resized, or if the content being displayed is modified. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Print() cil managed

summary.span: 调用标准的“打印”对话框，此对话框可用于打印查看器的内容和配置打印首选项。

span.span: Invokes a standard **Print** dialog which can be used to print the contents of the viewer and configure printing preferences.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图显示一个标准的一个示例**打印**对话框。The following figure shows an example of a standard **Print** dialog. 请注意，特定的外观**打印**对话框可能会有所不同，具体取决于宿主计算机的配置。Note that the specific appearance of the **Print** dialog may vary depending on the hosting computer's configuration. ![屏幕快照: 打印对话框](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "屏幕快照： 打印对话框")![Screenshot: Print dialog box](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "Screenshot: Print dialog box")
